Text: The Cider House Rules is the soundtrack of the 1999 Academy Award-winning and Golden Globe-nominated film "The Cider House Rules" starring Tobey Maguire, Charlize Theron, Michael Caine (who won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his role as Dr. Wilbur Larch in this film) and Delroy Lindo.
